scripts.test: npm run babel-tests && npm run babel && node compiled-tests | ./node_modules/tap-spec/bin/cmd.js
scripts.test-plain: npm run babel && npm run babel-tests && node compiled-tests
scripts.cover: npm run babel && npm run babel-tests && ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover compiled-tests | ./node_modules/tap-spec/bin/cmd.js
scripts.babel-tests: rm -rf compiled-tests && npm run lint-tests && ./node_modules/babel/bin/babel.js tests -d compiled-tests
scripts.babel: rm -rf lib && npm run lint && ./node_modules/babel/bin/babel.js src -d lib
